titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, relating to public charter operations at certain reliever airports.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 3/5/1998--Introduced. Declares that it shall not be considered unreasonable or unjust discrimination for the owner or operator of a reliever airport that does not have an operating certificate to deny access to public charter operations.
